name: AWS Cloud Architecture
description: Designed secure and scalable AWS cloud foundations for enterprise-grade applications.
body_html:
AWS Cloud Architecture

A secure, production-ready AWS architecture built for high availability and resilience.

name: AWS Weather Dashboard
description: A real-time weather monitoring and visualization platform built with AWS serverless services.
body_html:
AWS Weather Dashboard

A serverless weather analytics and visualization platform.

ðŸš€ Highlights

  • Built backend using AWS Lambda
